Uses of Class
lk.vivoxalabs.customstage.CustomStageBuilder

  • Packages that use CustomStageBuilder 
    Package Description
    lk.vivoxalabs.customstage  

    • Uses of CustomStageBuilder in lk.vivoxalabs.customstage

      Methods in lk.vivoxalabs.customstage that return CustomStageBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CustomStageBuilder CustomStageBuilder.removeNavigationPane()
      Deprecated. 
      this method does not need to be called from this builder class after v1.1.0 Removes the left navigation pane of the window
      CustomStageBuilder CustomStageBuilder.setActionIcons(javafx.scene.image.Image close, javafx.scene.image.Image minimize, javafx.scene.image.Image maximize, javafx.scene.image.Image restore)
      Changes the default icons for the action buttons on Title-bar
      CustomStageBuilder CustomStageBuilder.setButtonColor(String color)
      Changes the color of the close, minimize and maximize/restore buttons
      CustomStageBuilder CustomStageBuilder.setButtonHoverColor(String color)
      Changes the color of the minimize and maximize/restore buttons on hover (close button's color won't change)
      CustomStageBuilder CustomStageBuilder.setButtonHoverColor(String btnMinColor, String btnMaxColor, String btnCloseColor) 
      CustomStageBuilder CustomStageBuilder.setDimensions(double minWidth, double minHeight, double maxWidth, double maxHeight)
      Sets the maximum and minimum resizing values for the window.
      CustomStageBuilder CustomStageBuilder.setIcon(String path)
      The icon for the window to be showed on taskbar
      CustomStageBuilder CustomStageBuilder.setNavigationPane(NavigationType type, javafx.scene.layout.Pane navigationPane)
      Sets a static navigation pane (to the pointed location) attaching the pane given
      CustomStageBuilder CustomStageBuilder.setNavigationPane(Style style, NavigationType type, javafx.scene.layout.Pane navigationPane)
      Sets a static/dynamic navigation pane (to the pointed location) attaching the pane given
      CustomStageBuilder CustomStageBuilder.setNavigationPane(Style style, NavigationType type, javafx.scene.layout.Pane navigationPane, double verticalSpace, double horizontalSpace, boolean isSpaceDivided)
      Sets the given navigationPane to the CustomStage as per its definitions (parameters).
      CustomStageBuilder CustomStageBuilder.setStyleSheet(URL path)
      Style the CustomStage as to the user given stylesheet
      CustomStageBuilder CustomStageBuilder.setTitleColor(String color)
      Changes the color of the color in title-bar
      CustomStageBuilder CustomStageBuilder.setWindowColor(String color)
      Changes the color of the window
      CustomStageBuilder CustomStageBuilder.setWindowTitle(String title)
      Sets the title of the title-bar
      CustomStageBuilder CustomStageBuilder.setWindowTitle(String title, HorizontalPos buttonPos, HorizontalPos titlePos)
      Sets the title of the title-bar and changes the position (on title-bar) of the ActionButtons and title
